definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
at a distance of/distance/to be apart

sentences.english: The difference between our price and your counteroffer is too wide.
sentences.chinese: 我方的價格與你方還盤之間差距太大。

sentences.english: So why is there not a third party that fills the gap?
sentences.chinese: 所以，爲什麼沒有第三黨來彌補這中間的差距？

sentences.english: The eternal question is whether this is just about sexism.
sentences.chinese: 這一永無休止的問題是，如此差距是否僅僅因爲性別。

sentences.english: Hugely promising, but its sequels have fallen far short.
sentences.chinese: 非常地有前景，但它的續集們卻與之差距很大。

sentences.english: The author probed into the advantages and shortages of Chinese women's volleyball team compared with world winning teams.
sentences.chinese: 並探討了中國女排與世界強隊相比的優勢和差距。

sentences.english: The development of information network industry in Western regions in China lags behind that in Eastern regions.
sentences.chinese: 西部地區的信息網絡業與東部地區比，有較大差距。

sentences.english: This policy exacerbates the gap between rich and poor.
sentences.chinese: 這項政策加劇了貧富差距。

sentences.english: What I mean is that we'll never be able to come down to your price. The gap is too great.
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是說的價格永遠不降到你方的，差距太大了。

sentences.english: Much of the rise in income inequality is attributed to globalization.
sentences.chinese: 收入差距拉大在很大程度上歸因於全球化。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, the difference should not be ignored.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這樣的差距不應被忽略。

sentences.english: Pelotas is a South Brazilian city of marked economic contrasts.
sentences.chinese: 佩洛塔斯是巴西南部一個以貧富差距而知名的城市。

sentences.english: Compared with foreign advanced tilt-rotor technology, we have quite a gap.
sentences.chinese: 與國外先進旋翼技術相比，我們有相當的差距。

sentences.english: But by 2008, those gaps had closed to 15% and 27%.
sentences.chinese: 但是在2008年時，差距減小到15%和27%。

sentences.english: Only by realize common prosperity and gradually narrow the gap between rich and poor can we achieve harmony.
sentences.chinese: 只有逐步縮小貧富差距，實現共同富裕才談得上和諧。

sentences.english: There's class divide, geographic divide, lack of political freedom.
sentences.chinese: 中國階級分化明顯，地域差距嚴重，政治又缺乏自由。

sentences.english: Consider pavers with gaps that can be planted.
sentences.chinese: 考慮可以種植的差距鋪路。

definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
lit. unable to distinguish eldest brother from second brother (idiom); they are all equally excellent/nothing to choose between them
difference/to distinguish/to discriminate/to make a distinction/CL:個|个[ge4]
